name: Mob Gangster Cartel War-fare
description:
Eden just moved to a new city, to study for his masters. But he was unable to pay his fees. He tried to get jobs but he was rejected mostly. One day Eden was just reading the newspaper so he could hunt jobs while he was at it he saw an article on the mafia, how much money they made. Ultimately Eden decides to join the mafia. The game starts from there.

Eden goes through a lot, throughout the whole story. Starting from a normal pick and drop missions to kidnapping and demolition missions. This story shows a desperate students perspective to make a living. Till the end of the story he really accomplishes his goal.

Game Features:

- The most realistic city environment ever seen in driving simulator history on the App store
- Swipe Across the Screen to put the Camera Wherever you Want
- Car chase missions
- Demolition missions
- Kidnapping missions
- Sniper missions and much more
- Do whatever you want to, the whole city is your playground until you're busted.

This is the first version of the game. If you find bugs or issues, tell us about it so we can fix it and improve the quality for our users.
